text: Nassarius louisi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The shell grows to a length of 6 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Eastern Mediterranean Sea off Syria. ==References== * Gofas, S.; Le Renard, J.; Bouchet, P. (2001). Mollusca, in: Costello, M.J. et al. (Ed.) (2001). European register of marine species: a check-list of the marine species in Europe and a bibliography of guides to their identification. Collection Patrimoines Naturels, 50: pp. 180–213 ==External links== * Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1912
title: Nassarius louisi
